!SESSION Sat Jul 23 12:36:41 IST 2005 ------------------------------------------
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.launcher 4 0 Jul 23, 2005 12:36:41.850
!MESSAGE Exception launching the Eclipse Platform:
!STACK
java.lang.RuntimeException: Could not find framework
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.getBootPath(Main.java:395)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:174)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:704)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:688)
my operating system is windows 98 & Nt

You'll just end up ticking people off opening bugzillas with minimal problem
descriptions like this.  I'm not even sure what compelled you to pick EMF as the
target component for this?  You're certainly not using EMF 2.2, because we
haven't even provided a build for that next release yet. And this clearly is not
an EMF problem.

I'm not even going to assign this to the platform for you.  I'll return it as
invalid and suggest that you provide all the information needed to reproduce
your problem.  I.e., what level of Eclipse are you using, what JDK, and what you
did to produce this stack.
